content:
When walking with <color=#38b6c5>WASD keys</color>,
hold down <color=#38b6c5>right mouse button</color> at the same time,
and you can zoom around just like me!
info: 莎莎走路加速教学_莎莎

content:
Mobai is one thing,
but why are you walking so leisurely too?
Come on, follow my lead—
info: 莎莎走路加速教学_莎莎
